query.text: declare @q nvarchar(4000), @Key nvarchar(4000) -- select @Key = '(@@admin = 1 or ma_bp in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID))' select @Key = @Key + ' and (ngay_thay_doi between ''' + convert(varchar(8), @$ngay_bd_tu, 112) + ''' and ''' + convert(varchar(8), @$ngay_bd_den, 112) + ''')' if @$ngay_kt_tu is not null select @Key = @Key + ' and (ngay_thay_doi2 >= ''' + convert(varchar(8), @$ngay_kt_tu, 112) + ''')' if @$ngay_kt_den is not null select @Key = @Key + ' and (ngay_thay_doi2 <= ''' + convert(varchar(8), @$ngay_kt_den, 112) + ''')' if @$bp_ref <> '' select @Key = @Key + ' and (bp_ref like ''' + @$bp_ref + '%'')' if @$ma_nv <> '' select @Key = @Key + ' and (ma_nv = ''' + @$ma_nv + ''')' -- select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, a.ngay_thay_doi into #hreqtlbhht from hreqtlbhht a select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.ngay_thay_doi into #t from hreqtlbhht a -- select @q = 'insert into #hreqtlbhht select stt_rec, stt_rec0, max(ngay_thay_doi) from vhreqtlbhht2 where ' + @Key + ' group by stt_rec, stt_rec0' if @$lEmpSi_yn = 1 begin select @q = @q + char(13) + 'insert into #t select stt_rec, max(ngay_thay_doi) from #hreqtlbhht group by stt_rec' select @q = @q + char(13) + 'delete #hreqtlbhht from #hreqtlbhht a left join #t b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_thay_doi = b.ngay_thay_doi where b.stt_rec is null' end exec sp_executesql @q select @q = 'select e.ma_nv, rtrim(e.ho_nv) + space(1) + e.ten_nv as ho_ten, b.ngay_thay_doi, b.ngay_thay_doi2, b.loai_thay_doi, b.cap_bac, b.chuc_danh, b.don_vi, b.dia_chi, b.hs_luong, b.hs_pc_chuc_vu, b.hs_pc_vuot_khung, b.hs_pc_khu_vuc, b.hs_pc_tham_nien, b.t_he_so, b.luong_toi_thieu, b.luong_co_ban, b.ty_le_bhxh, b.tien_bhxh, b.ty_le_bhyt, b.tien_bhyt, b.ty_le_bhtn, b.tien_bhtn, b.ty_le_kpcd, b.tien_kpcd, b.can_cu' select @q = @q + ' from #hreqtlbhht a join hreqtlbhht b with(nolock) on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0 = b.stt_rec0 join hrnv e with(nolock) on a.stt_rec = e.stt_rec' exec sp_executesql @q
